pullrequest.title: Move systems to a dir and namespace

content.raw:
I think we broke Bitbucket, I'm not able to change the target branch... But I was able to merge `move_systems` into `default`: a52e258

FYI, @support
content.html:
I think we broke Bitbucket, I'm not able to change the target branch... But I was able to merge move_systems into default: a52e258

FYI, @support

pullrequest.title: Move systems to a dir and namespace

content.raw:
As a reference, what I did locally was:

~~~
  hg up move_components # reopen closed branch
  hg merge move_systems # this closes the PR
  hg commit -m "merged pull request #25"
  hg up default 
  hg merge move_components # merged into default just in case 
  hg commit -m "merged from move_components"
  hg pull
  hg up default 
  hg merge # had to merge heads because my local default was old
  hg commit -m "merged heads"
  hg push
~~~
content.html:
As a reference, what I did locally was:

  hg up move_components # reopen closed branch
  hg merge move_systems # this closes the PR
  hg commit -m "merged pull request #25"
  hg up default 
  hg merge move_components # merged into default just in case 
  hg commit -m "merged from move_components"
  hg pull
  hg up default 
  hg merge # had to merge heads because my local default was old
  hg commit -m "merged heads"
  hg push
